entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SSW 41 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
